name: ManaRocks
description: ManaRocks is a new type of online strategy card game called Seasonal Card Game. On SCGs you will experience a Real Free to Play game, no Booster Packs no Loot Boxes. Use imagination to create your decks and battle games in 1v1 and 2v2 modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5, 2.4 Ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated HD Graphics 520 w/128 MB or better Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
